name: Xmas Survivors
description:
Game Made for HMO JAM 1

Survive for 5 minutes and help santa get back all of the xmas gifts from the world!

Esc Menu (Quit button)
Left click (Hold) Move
Right click (Hold) Cannon mode
Left click while on cannon mode to shoot

Every level you get 1% damage of bombs and cannon.
Every 10 levels you get an extra gingerbread cookie.

Special thanks to:
https://murphysdad.itch.io/
https://axlplosion.itch.io/
